app.title: Supplementary Materials
app.p: The following are available online at https://www.mdpi.com/1660-4601/16/21/4179/s1. Figure S1: Temporal distribution of the weekly incidence proxies for influenza A/H1N1 from 2010 to 2019. Figure S2: Temporal distribution of the weekly incidence proxies for influenza B from 2010 to 2019.Figure S3: Residual standard error for various combinations for thresholds h and h c . Table S1: Summary of the prediction timing of week s and the epidemic peak weeks of influenza A/H1N1, A/H3N2, and B.
